title: Tour de France ‘Big Four’ Report Card: Questions for Roglič, Crushing from Vingegaard, the Pogačar Puzzle
content:
Who's hot, who's not, and what next for the yellow jersey favorites after Paris-Nice, Tirreno-Adriatico, Strade Bianche?

Read the full article at Tour de France ‘Big Four’ Report Card: Questions for Roglič, Crushing from Vingegaard, the Pogačar Puzzle on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
